data.eml:eml: Systematics, phylogeny and biology of a new genus of Lithocolletinae (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae) associated with Cistaceae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prins, Jurate De, Davis, Donald R., Coninck, Eliane De, Sohn, Jae-Cheon, Triberti, Paolo (2013): Systematics, phylogeny and biology of a new genus of Lithocolletinae (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae) associated with Cistaceae. Zootaxa 3741 (2): 201-227, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3741.2.1
